FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our solutions and services.

integration.question: How do I integrate Rfx Studio solutions into my business?
integration.answer: Integration is simple and fast thanks to our robust and well-documented APIs. We offer SDKs for major platforms and frameworks. Our technical team is available to assist you throughout the integration phase.

security.question: What security standards do you apply for data protection?
security.answer: We apply a 'Security by Design' approach. Our infrastructures are enterprise-grade and comply with industry standards. All sensitive data is encrypted end-to-end (AES-256) and we perform regular security audits.

support.question: Do you offer technical support?
support.answer: Yes, we have a dedicated support team available 24/7 for our Enterprise clients. We also offer RelayOn, our AI-powered customer support platform that helps businesses provide instant, intelligent assistance to their users around the clock.

viralis.question: How does Viralis help with content strategy?
viralis.answer: Viralis uses AI to analyze media trends and provide actionable insights. It helps creators and marketers understand their audience, optimize content timing, and amplify their reach across platforms.

customization.question: Can I customize solutions according to my needs?
customization.answer: Absolutely. While our platforms are ready to use out of the box, our development team can adapt features to your specific requirements or build custom integrations for your unique workflow.
